dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5561 IH: Picket Line Protection Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Thanedar introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude strike benefits from gross income.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Picket Line Protection Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Part III of subchapter B of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new section:

section.header: Compensation for lost wages relating to a strike
section.text: In the case of an individual, gross income shall not include compensation provided to a member of a labor organization described in section 501(c)(5) if such compensation is provided as a replacement for compensation not received by such member from such memberâ€™s employer as the result of a strike.

subsection.text: The table of sections for part III of subchapter B of chapter 1 of such Code is amended by inserting the following new item after the item relating to section 139I:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 139J. Compensation for lost wages relating to a strike.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to compensation received after January 1, 2025.
